scripts.frontmatter:
echo '---
title: Awesome Tools
layout: null
---
' | cat - ../_site/index2.html > temp && mv temp ../_site/index2.html
scripts.deploy: npm run purge && npm run frontmatter
scripts.distribute: npm run build && cp build/static/js/2.*.chunk.js ../assets/modabyflora/reactjs/chunk.js && cp build/static/js/main.*.js ../assets/modabyflora/reactjs/main.chunk.js && cp build/static/js/runtime-main.*.js ../assets/modabyflora/reactjs/runtime-main.js
